verses.roman:
eka-dina sabhāte prabhu vāta cālāilā
nṛsiṁhānandera guṇa kahite lāgilā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; sabhāte—in the presence of all the devotees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vāta cālāilā—raised the topic (of eating at Nṛsiṁhānanda's house); nṛsiṁhānandera—of Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī; guṇa—transcendental qualities; kahite lāgilā—began to speak.
translation: One day, in the presence of all the devotees, the Lord raised these topics concerning Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī and praised his transcendental qualities.
